metadata.description: Emasoft's Claude Code plugins collection - high-quality productivity tools

plugins.name: perfect-skill-suggester
plugins.description: High-accuracy skill activation (88%+) with AI-analyzed keywords, weighted scoring, synonym expansion, and three-tier confidence routing.

plugins.name: claude-plugins-validation
